description.value:
You Interact to sheathe your samurai weapon, immediately entering @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance} afterwards. Until the end of your turn, your next Hakaze is empowered to deal an additional @Damage[(floor((@actor.level - 12)/4) + 2)d12[persistent,bleed]] damage with a @Check[fortitude|against:class] saving throw instead of its normal damage; on a critical hit, the DC is 3 higher. At 12th level and every 4 levels thereafter, increase the persistent bleeding damage by 1d12.

Success The creature takes the full precision damage of Hakaze, but does not take any bleed damage.

Failure As success, but the target takes the full persistent bleed damage.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target takes persistent bleed damage equal to the precision damage dice of hakaze in addition to higanbana (@Damage[(floor((@actor.level - 12)/4) + 2)d12[persistent,bleed],(floor((@actor.level - 4)/3) + 2)d6[persistent,bleed]]).
